there is a mountain named Kukkuṭa;
In the middle of it, there lived
a brahmin who had mastered the mantras.
A Buddha has arisen in the world,
The Victorious One, the best of the wise,
Having heard the words of his disciples,
the brahmin who had mastered the mantras
and asked his disciples for the direction
the Leader of the World, was dwelling.
I paid homage to that direction,
to the Victorious One, who is without equal;
Having paid homage at the feet of the Teacher,
we will listen to the Victorious One’s teaching.”
I became afflicted with a disease,
I went to stay in a Sāla tree.
I asked them about the Realised One;
“What is the nature of the Lord of the World,
The quality of the Supreme Buddha?”
They, being asked by me, replied,
